clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated for use as a supplement to intravenous solutions given for total parenteral nutrition TPN L2065

contraindications.disease: Acute oral LD50 is 4340 mg kg in rat and 1000 mg kg in mouse MSDS Chronic iodide overdoses may result in iodism which is commonly characterized by salivation coryza sneezing conjunctivitis headache fever laryngitis bronchitis stomatitis parotitis and oedema of the glottis L2061 Up to 10g of sodium iodide has been administered intravenously without any signs of toxicity L2061
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: When intravenously administered for total parental nutrition sodium iodide prevents the depletion of endogenous stores of iodine and subsequent deficiency symptoms L2065
